verses.verse: Hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> which Yahweh<WH3068> speaks<WH1696> to you,<WH1004> house of Israel!<WH3478>

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> "Don't<WH3925> learn the way<WH1870> of the nations,<WH1471> and don't<WH2865> be dismayed at the signs<WH226> of the sky;<WH8064> for the nations<WH1471> are dismayed<WH2865> at them.<WH1992>

For the customs<WH2708> of the peoples<WH5971> are vanity;<WH1892> for one cuts<WH3772> a tree<WH6086> out of the forest,<WH3293> the work<WH4639> of the hands<WH3027> of the workman<WH2796> with the axe.<WH4621>
They deck<WH3302> it with silver<WH3701> and with gold;<WH2091> they fasten<WH2388> it with nails<WH4548> and with hammers,<WH4717> that it not move.<WH6328>

They are like<WH4749> a palm tree,<WH8560> of turned work,<WH1696> and don't speak: they must<WH5375> be carried,<WH5375> because they can't<WH6805> go. Don't<WH3372> be afraid of them;<WH7489> for they can't do evil, neither is it in them to do good.<WH3190>"
There is none like you,<WH3068> Yahweh; you are great,<WH1419> and your name<WH8034> is great<WH1419> in might.<WH1369>

Who should not fear<WH3372> you,<WH4428> King of the nations?<WH1471> For it appertains<WH2969> to you;<WH2450> because among all the wise men of the nations,<WH1471> and in all their royal estate,<WH4438> there is none like you.
But they are together<WH259> brutish<WH1197> and foolish:<WH3688> the instruction<WH4148> of idols!<WH6086> it is but a stock.<WH6086>

There is silver<WH3701> beaten into plates,<WH7554> which is brought<WH935> from Tarshish,<WH8659> and gold<WH2091> from Uphaz,<WH210> the work<WH4639> of the artificer<WH2796> and of the hands<WH3027> of the goldsmith;<WH6884> blue<WH8504> and purple<WH713> for their clothing;<WH3830> they are all the work<WH4639> of skillful men.<WH2450>

But Yahweh<WH3068> is the true<WH571> God;<WH430> he is the living<WH2416> God,<WH430> and an everlasting<WH5769> King:<WH4428> at his wrath<WH7110> the earth<WH776> trembles,<WH7493> and the nations<WH1471> are not able to withstand<WH3557> his indignation.<WH2195>

You<WH1836> shall say<WH560> this to them:<WH426> The gods that have not<WH3809> made<WH5648> the heavens<WH8065> and the earth,<WH778> these shall perish<WH7> from the earth,<WH772> and from under<WH8460> the<WH429> heavens.<WH8065>

He has made<WH6213> the earth<WH776> by his power,<WH3581> he has established<WH3559> the world<WH8398> by his wisdom,<WH2451> and by his understanding<WH2451> has he stretched out<WH5186> the heavens:<WH8064>

when he utters<WH5414> his voice,<WH6963> there is a tumult<WH1995> of waters<WH4325> in the heavens,<WH8064> and he causes the vapors<WH5387> to ascend<WH5927> from the ends<WH7097> of the earth;<WH776> he makes<WH6213> lightnings<WH1300> for the rain,<WH4306> and brings forth<WH3318> the wind<WH7307> out of his treasuries.<WH214>

Every man<WH120> has become brutish<WH1197> and without knowledge;<WH1847> every goldsmith<WH6884> is disappointed<WH3001> by his engraved image;<WH6459> for his molten image<WH5262> is falsehood,<WH8267> and there is no breath in them.<WH7307>
They are vanity,<WH1892> a work<WH4639> of delusion:<WH8595> in the time<WH6256> of their visitation<WH6486> they shall perish.<WH6>

The portion<WH2506> of Jacob<WH3290> is not like these;<WH3335> for he is the former of all things;<WH3478> and Israel is the tribe<WH7626> of his inheritance:<WH5159> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> is his name.<WH8034>
Gather up<WH622> your wares<WH3666> out of the land,<WH776> you who live<WH3427> under siege.<WH4692>
For thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> Behold,<WH7049> I will sling out the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776> at this time,<WH6471> and will distress<WH6887> them,<WH4672> that they may feel it.
Woe<WH188> is me because of my hurt!<WH7667> my wound<WH4347> is grievous:<WH2470> but I said,<WH559> Truly<WH389> this is my grief,<WH2483> and I must bear it.<WH5375>

My tent<WH168> is destroyed,<WH7703> and all my cords<WH4340> are broken:<WH5423> my children<WH1121> are gone forth<WH3318> from me,<WH5186> and they are no more: there is none to spread my tent<WH168> any more,<WH6965> and to set up my curtains.<WH3407>
For the shepherds<WH7462> are become brutish,<WH1197> and have not inquired<WH1875> of Yahweh:<WH3068> therefore they have not prospered,<WH7919> and all their flocks<WH4830> are scattered.<WH6327>

The voice<WH6963> of news,<WH8052> behold,<WH935> it comes, and a great<WH1419> commotion<WH7494> out of the north<WH6828> country,<WH776> to make<WH7760> the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063> a desolation,<WH8077> a dwelling<WH4583> place of jackals.<WH8577>
Yahweh,<WH3068> I know<WH3045> that the way<WH1870> of man<WH120> is not in himself:<WH376> it is not in man who walks<WH1980> to direct<WH3559> his steps.<WH6806>
Yahweh,<WH3068> correct<WH3256> me,<WH4941> but in measure: not in your anger,<WH639> lest you bring me to nothing.<WH4591>

Pour out<WH8210> your wrath<WH2534> on the nations<WH1471> that don't<WH3045> know you,<WH4940> and on the families that don't<WH7121> call on your name:<WH8034> for they have devoured<WH398> Jacob,<WH3290> yes,<WH398> they have devoured him and consumed<WH3615> him,<WH8074> and have laid waste his habitation.<WH5116>
